text:
Paper Name,Publish Year,Model Used,Dataset,Performance Metric,Application
RRFMDS: Rapid Real-Time Face Mask Detection System for Effective COVID-19 Monitoring,2023,SSD (Single-Shot Multi-box Detector) + MobileNetV2,"Custom dataset with 14,535 images (5000 incorrect masks, 4789 with masks, 4746 without masks)","Training Accuracy: 99.15%, Testing Accuracy: 97.81%, F1-score: 0.98, FPS: 7 (CPU)","CCTV monitoring, hospitals, supermarkets, educational institutes, public places"
LLE-NET for Masked Face Detection,2017,LLE-CNN with three modules,MAFA dataset,Average precision: 74.6%,Face occlusion detection
Cascaded CNN Framework,2017,Three cascaded CNN classifiers,WiderFace + MASKED FACES (200 images),"Accuracy: 86.6%, Recall: 87.8%",Face mask detection
SRCNet Model,2020,Image Super-Resolution Network + MobileNetV2,Medical Mask Dataset (MMD),Accuracy: 98.07%,Medical face mask detection
YOLOv2 + ResNet50,2021,YOLOv2 + ResNet50,FMD + MMD datasets,Average precision: 81%,Medical face mask detection
VGG-16 Face Mask Detection,2020,VGG-16 CNN,Custom dataset (25,000 images),Accuracy: 96%,Face mask detection
SSDMNV2 Model,2021,Single-Shot Multi-box Detector + MobileNetV2,Custom dataset (5,521 images),"Test accuracy: 92%, F1-score: 0.93",Real-time face mask detection
An Efficient and Effective Deep Learning-Based Model for Real-Time Face Mask Detection,2022,MobileNetV2 + Autoencoder (Deep Learning Hybrid),"FMD, FM, and RMFR datasets (with data augmentation)","Accuracy: 99.98%, Precision: 99.97%, Recall: 99.97%, F1-score: 0.9998, FPS: 18.07 (Raspberry Pi)","Edge AI deployment for real-time face mask detection"
